Data: Arnel to Hussey, FOUR runs good start to the session by Australia, a dolly of a half volley on the pads and gently tucked away wide of midwicket, forget about chasing it
Arnel to Hussey, no run good length on the off stump and defended back to the bowler
Arnel to Hussey, no run close call for Hussey, he leaves a ball which sailed just inches above the bails, well bowled
Arnel to Hussey, FOUR runs not a bad delivery but well played, gets well forward, opens the face of the bat and runs it down the gap between second slip and gully
Arnel to Hussey, no run hits the deck hard and Hussey gets under that bouncer
Arnel to Hussey, no run holds the length back on the off stump and defended back to the bowler
Southee to Katich, no run shuffles across and tries to tickle it down to fine leg but misses
Southee to Katich, no run good length on the off stump and defended back to the bowler
Southee to Katich, no run shuffles and clips it down to Watling at midwicket
Southee to Katich, no run lands it on a good length outside off and safely left alone
Southee to Katich, no run too wide outside the leg stump and katich cannot tickle it down
Southee to Katich, no run gets beside the line and pushes it to cover point
Arnel to Hussey, no run dead straight on the stumps, Arnel's done that a lot today, defended back to the bowler
Arnel to Hussey, no run the ball holds its line before heading to the keeper
Arnel to Hussey, no run gets beside the line and steers it down to cover point
Arnel to Hussey, no run fullish in length on the off stump and pushed down to mid-off
Arnel to Hussey, no run fullish in length on the off stump and pushed down to mid-off
Arnel to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey decides to take him to task, fetches a good length ball from outside off and pulls hard and along the ground wide of mid-on and midwicket
Southee to Katich, FOUR runs down the leg side and Katich finally manages to tickle it wide of the keeper and down to fine leg, that's his fifty as well
Southee to Katich, no run hits the deck hard and he gets under the bouncer
Southee to Katich, no run gets beside the line and pushes it to cover, tells his partner to wait
Southee to Katich, no run kicks up a bit and Katich hops and fends it off down the pitch
Southee to Katich, no run keeps it on a good length outside off and he lets it go, the ball moves back inwards before reaching McCullum
Southee to Katich, no run drifts down the leg side and he half heartedly tries to tuck it away
Arnel to Hussey, no run tapped towards cover and Hussey gets off the crease and tells Katich to wait
Arnel to Hussey, no run shuffles and tucks him to the on side
Arnel to Hussey, no run comes round the wicket for the first time today, Hussey pushes it to midwicket
Arnel to Hussey, no run nips back in and tucks him high on the pads, stifled appeal but the ball was clearly heading over the stumps
Arnel to Hussey, no run the bouncer this time and Hussey gets under it early enough
Arnel to Hussey, no run lands it outside off and Hussey lets it go, that's a maiden
Southee to Katich, FOUR runs picks the big gap at deep square leg, drifts on the pads and he easily works it away wide of Watling who gives the chase, that's 500 runs for Katich v NZ
Southee to Katich, no run shapes to drive straighter but gets an inside edge to midwicket
Southee to Katich, no run taps it to the off side
Southee to Katich, 1 run another big shuffle across the stumps and tucked to the on side, Watling runs across and hits the middle stump down at the bowler's end but Katich is home
Southee to Hussey, no run lands outside off and he safely lets it go
Southee to Hussey, no run good delivery, squares up Hussey on the channel outside off, the ball straightens as it beats the bat
Arnel to Katich, FOUR runs well controlled, gets beside the line, plays a punchy backfoot drive behind gully and the ball races away
Arnel to Katich, FOUR runs goes the other side this time, half volley on middle and off, Katich uses his wrists very well and effortlessly tucks it wide of mid-on and midwicket
Arnel to Katich, 1 run taps it to the off side and takes a single
Arnel to Hussey, FOUR runs they're plundering runs here, this time he bowls it fuller outside off and Hussey bends his knee slightly and cuts behind square on the off side

Arnel to Hussey, no run it's a referral, the ball lands on a good length outside off and hits Hussey above the pads, the umpire says not out but Ross Taylor convinces Vettori to refer it, wasted referral really because at normal speed it was fairly obvious that it was going above the stumps
Arnel to Hussey, FOUR runs ends a poor over, full on the pads and pushed neatly through the line wide of mid-on
Southee to Katich, 4 leg byes drifts down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and just beats the diving McCullum
Southee to Katich, no run cuts hard but finds point
Southee to Katich, 2 runs turns his bat and clips it just wide of mid-on, the runs are flowing here
Southee to Katich, 1 run pulls a short delivery but Watling is stationed at deep square leg to cut it off
Southee to Hussey, no run too wide outside off and safely left alone, close to being called wide

Southee to Hussey, no run edged and falls short! McIntosh the man again at second slip, Hussey gets forward but keeps it down, the edge travels low and quick and just lands short of McIntosh who dives to his right
Vettori to Katich, no run moves across and clips it to midwicket
Vettori to Katich, no run gets well forward and pushes the ball down to mid-off
Vettori to Katich, no run gets well forward and pushes it to the off side
Vettori to Katich, no run gets his pad forward and shoulders arms
Vettori to Katich, no run no turn, shoulders arms again
Vettori to Katich, no run tossed up on the pads and clipped wide of forward short leg
Southee to Hussey, no run keeps it on the channel outside off and defended to the off side

Southee to Hussey, OUT we saw it coming! Southee had beaten Hussey just a short while back outside the off stump, this time he pitches it up outside off and draws Hussey to drive forward, takes the edge which was loud and clear, Rauf confirms it
Southee to Clarke, 3 runs gets off the mark with a gentle clip off the pads, beats midwicket
Southee to Katich, no run gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
Southee to Katich, FOUR runs bowls short and Katich punishes him, moves across, rides the bounce and bisects the gap between two fielders at the deep and the ball races to long leg
Southee to Katich, no run taps it to the packed off side field
Vettori to Clarke, no run defends close to the pads, the ball rolls to the off side
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run moves forward, rocks back and cuts to the sweeper in the deep
Vettori to Katich, no run walks down the pitch and checks his shot to midwicket
Vettori to Katich, no run moves a long way across and defends back to the bowler
Vettori to Katich, no run gets forward and drives to mid-on
Vettori to Katich, no run lands outside off and he leaves that to the keeper
Southee to Clarke, no run the newer ball swings away from the right hander, looked like a leading edge which dropped short of short point
Southee to Clarke, 1 run bowls from wide of the crease, Clarke pushes it just wide of mid-off and calls quickly for the single
Southee to Katich, no run lands it on a good length outside off and he safely lets it go
Southee to Katich, no run moves across his stumps and tucks him down to mid-on
Southee to Katich, 1 run drifts on the pads and he shuffles across and tucks him down to fine leg
Southee to Clarke, no run swings it on that off stump to Clarke, he pushes it to mid-off
Vettori to Katich, no run stays back and cuts him to the off side
Vettori to Katich, no run quicker and gets a nice loop, forces Katich to check his shot
Vettori to Katich, FOUR runs well played Simon! He moves across and quickly adjusts on seeing the turn, makes just enough room to cut with control wide of gully
Vettori to Katich, 1 run clips him towards short fine leg for a single
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, he tucks it wide of midwicket
Vettori to Katich, no run quicker delivery, defended on the backfoot
Patel to Clarke, no run drifts in and he cuts to the off side
Patel to Clarke, no run chips down the track but checks his shot, rolls to mid-on
Patel to Clarke, no run action replay, comes down the track again and checks his shot
Patel to Clarke, no run chips down the track but places it straight to midwicket
Patel to Clarke, 1 run comes down the pitch and takes it on the full beats the bowler and Southee's there at long-on to cut it off
Patel to Katich, no run blocks it just wide of forward short leg
Martin to Clarke, no run lands it outside off and the ball comes back in after pitching, left alone
Martin to Clarke, no run fullish in length outside off and defended softly to the off side
Martin to Clarke, 1 run comes back in and he tucks it with the movement down to midwicket
Martin to Katich, no run moves across the stumps and chops it to Watling at point
Martin to Katich, no run tentative shuffle and he gets a leading edge to the off side along the ground, it was a full delivery which he should have put away wide of mid-pn
Martin to Katich, 1 run takes the risk of exposing his stumps yet again, tucks it to fine leg, he looks a candidate for a bowled or lbw at this rate
Patel to Katich, 1 run gets forward and drives to Arnel at sweeper cover
Patel to Clarke, no run tossed up outside off, gets forward and drives to midwicket
Patel to Clarke, no run comes down the pitch and chips it towards midwicket
Patel to Clarke, no run gets well forward and drives straight to mid-off
Patel to Clarke, no run twinkle toes Clarke again, and he clips it to the fielder at midwicket again
Patel to Clarke, 1 run now he rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover

Martin to Clarke, no run what did that hit? Clarke was caught off guard with a bouncer, he decides at the last minute to withdraw the short and the ball fizzes past his glove and hits his helmet, lobs up and goes to slip (McIntosh), they appeal for the catch and Aleem Dar shakes his head, good decision by the umpire, Clarke calls for a
Martin to Clarke, FOUR runs pulls but beats midwicket, short delivery, Clarke rides the bounce and pulls wide of the fielder who dives in vain
Martin to Clarke, 1 run short and pulls again, Southee nearly over-runs it at fine leg but manages to get his hands behind the ball, good pick up and throw
Martin to Katich, no run pushes it to mid-off
Martin to Katich, no run shapes away from the left-hander and he leaves it alone
Martin to Katich, no run gets across his stumps and tucks it to mid-on
Patel to Clarke, 1 run rocks back and slaps it hard, Martin fields at short cover
Patel to Katich, no run shifts to the backfoot and cuts him to the off side
Patel to Katich, no run gets forward and pushes it towards point
Patel to Katich, no run thrusts forward and smothers the spin
Patel to Katich, 1 run comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
Patel to Clarke, 1 run gets forward and chips it down to mid-on
Martin to Clarke, no run drives away from the body and mistimes it to mid-off
Martin to Clarke, FOUR runs lovely shot Pup! He rides the inswing, gets the front foot well forward, works his wrists and effortlessly clips it past the gap between mid-on and midwicket, silken touch
Martin to Clarke, (no ball) he oversteps, left alone to the keeper
Martin to Clarke, FOUR runs hits a good length outside off, Clarke gets beside the line and plays a punchy drive past gully
Martin to Clarke, no run good comeback by Martin, teases him outside off with a pitched up delivery and just beats the outside edge

Martin to Clarke, FOUR runs good effort by Southee but in vain, Martin drifts down the leg side and Clarke clips it away fine, Southee sprints across, cuts it off at first but the ball rolls back to the rope
Martin to Clarke, no run
Patel to Katich, no run gets forward and drives to cover
Patel to Katich, 1 run shuffles across and clips him to short fine leg

Patel to Clarke, OUT yet another Australian gives his wicket away! Flighted on the off stump, Clarke chips down the track but doesn't loft with any conviction at all, Southee's there at long-on and he runs forward and takes it comfortably, Clarke fell for the trap
Patel to North, no run just gets forward in time to defend
Patel to North, 1 run gets off the mark with a clip to fine leg
Patel to Katich, no run tucks it past forward short leg, hesitation in the calling there
Martin to North, no run lands it outside off and North is happy to let it go
Martin to North, no run angles it across the left-hander and he safely lets it go
Martin to North, no run full on the off stump and pushed towards cover
Martin to North, no run full again and the batsman checks his drive to the off side
Martin to North, no run angles it wider across the left-hander and he safely leaves it
Martin to North, no run angles it on middle and he safely taps it back to the bowler
Patel to Katich, FOUR runs good shot, he rocks back, waits for the turn and cuts it late wide of slip and gully
Patel to Katich, no run gets forward and drives to the off side
Patel to Katich, no run tucks him to the off side
Patel to Katich, no run tossed up outside off, defended to the off side
Patel to Katich, no run gets forward and smothers the spin
Patel to Katich, no run shoulders arms very close to the off stump
Martin to North, no run lands it on a good length on middle and leg, pushed through the line to mid-on
Martin to North, no run gets forward and taps it towards cover
Martin to North, no run half stride forward and he gets an inside edge close to the pads
Martin to North, no run probes outside the off stump and he safely leaves it to the keeper
Martin to North, no run bowls a fuller length, this time he pushes it firmly to mid-on
Martin to North, no run nice quick bouncer, North ducks under it
Patel to Katich, no run gets forward and defends quite late
Patel to Katich, 1 run gets off the strike with a clips wide of forward short leg
Patel to North, no run tries to slap it through the off side but finds point
Patel to North, no run stays back and punches it back to the bowler
Patel to North, no run stays back and defends back to the bowler
Patel to North, no run defends with soft hands again
Martin to Katich, no run another big shuffle, he mistimes the clip to midwicket
Martin to Katich, no run exposes his leg stump and gets a leading edge towards mid-off
Martin to Katich, no run pushes it to midwicket and tells North to head back
Martin to Katich, no run nice delivery, Martin saw Katich shuffle a long way across again and fires it short and on the body, Katich just bends down in time to evade it
Martin to Katich, no run stays back and clips it straight to mid-on
Martin to Katich, 1 run big shuffle and clipped to Southee at fine leg
Patel to Katich, no run comes forward and defends to the off side
Patel to Katich, no run comes forward and defends towards point again
Patel to Katich, no run pushes it towards cover
Patel to Katich, no run another push to the same fielder, playing for tea which is less than 10 minutes away
Patel to Katich, no run no turn, he leaves it to the keeper
Patel to Katich, 1 run
Vettori to Katich, no run comes well forward and defends to mid-off
Vettori to Katich, no run squirts it to cover
Vettori to Katich, no run comes forward and defends

Vettori to Katich, OUT Katich falls just before tea! He shuffle across his stumps yet again and tries to clip it to the on side, but the ball goes straight off the bat and goes to Watling at forward short leg, no doubts about that at all
Vettori to Haddin, no run comes well forward and defends
Vettori to Haddin, no run defends down the track and we will have one more over before tea
Patel to North, no run tucked just wide of forward short leg
Patel to North, no run punches it back to the bowler
Patel to North, no run gets forward and smothers the spin
Patel to North, no run comes forward and defends safely
Patel to North, no run clips it to the on side
Patel to North, no run tossed up on middle and defended safely and that's tea
Vettori to Haddin, no run stays back and defends back to the bowler
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run bowls it much quicker and flatter, just manages to get behind the line to defend
Vettori to North, no run stays back and defends
Vettori to North, no run tossed up outside off and defended
Vettori to North, no run pushed to the off side and well fielded at extra cover
Vettori to North, no run the arm ball and North is foxed outside off stump, just withdraws his bat
Southee to Haddin, no run fullish in length on the off stump and defended to silly mid-off
Southee to Haddin, no run gets beside the line and defends towards point
Southee to Haddin, no run bangs it in short and he withdraws the shot, Raif signals the one bouncer for the over
Southee to Haddin, no run stays behind the line and defends
Southee to Haddin, no run a little wide outside the off stump and Haddin doesn't offer a shot
Southee to Haddin, no run stays behind the line and defends
Vettori to North, no run
Vettori to North, no run tossed up on middle and defended down the track
Vettori to North, no run no turn, left alone to the keeper
Vettori to North, 2 runs paddles it down to fine leg and Southee just manages to pull it back
Vettori to North, no run quicker through the air and defended to midwicket
Vettori to North, FOUR runs great shot! Quicker through the air, he lunges forward and a defensive push is enough to beat mid-off and cover
Southee to Haddin, no run beaten! The ball moves away very late and the ball just beats the edge, the bat may have clipped the pad
Southee to Haddin, no run
Southee to Haddin, no run shuffles and tucks it straight to Patel at midwicket
Southee to Haddin, no run gives him width outside off and he lashes at it and places it straight to point
Southee to Haddin, 1 run bangs it in short and he pulls him straight to Arnel at fine leg
Southee to North, no run fullish in length on the off stump and defended to the off side
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up on the off stump and defended to the off side
Vettori to Haddin, no run tossed up on off again and defended
Vettori to Haddin, 1 run Haddin pushes to Vettori at mid-off and risks the single, the throw is just wide of the stumps and Haddin dives
Vettori to North, no run
Vettori to North, no run clipped to the on side
Vettori to North, no run softly tucks it to midwicket
Southee to Haddin, no run lands it on a good length outside off and he safely lets it go
Southee to Haddin, no run stays behind the line and defends down the track
Southee to Haddin, no run outside edge but just falls short of Guptill, Haddin keeps it down and Guptill dives at gully to cut it off
Southee to Haddin, 1 run full on the off stump and pushed down to mid-off
Southee to North, no run shapes to drive but gets an inside edge down the pitch
Southee to North, no run lands it wide outside off and North's happy to let it go
Vettori to Haddin, FOUR runs Haddin shows some intent, Vettori strays on the leg side and Haddin clears his back leg, gets on one knee and slogs him over midwicket
Vettori to Haddin, no run gets forward and defends
Vettori to Haddin, no run
Vettori to Haddin, no run Haddin tries to shovel it away from outside off but swishes at thin air
Vettori to Haddin, no run gets forward and defends
Vettori to Haddin, no run gets forward and smothers the spin
Southee to North, no run close call for North! He defends with sift hands, the ball hits his pads, then hits his boot and nearly rolls towards the stumps
Southee to North, no run stays back and defends more firmly this time
Southee to North, 1 run shuffles and tucks it to the on side
Southee to Haddin, FOUR runs confident shot, Southee hits the deck hard and Haddin swivels and hooks, gets his placement right and places it wide of fine leg
Southee to Haddin, no run stays back and defends to the off side

Southee to Haddin, OUT another soft dismissal and New Zealand are taking them all, Haddin shapes to punch it through the off side but checks his shot and ends up tamely tapping it back to the bowler, that fielder at silly mid-off may have played on his mind
Vettori to North, no run defended back to the bowler
Vettori to North, no run gets forward and tucks it towards midwicket
Vettori to North, 1 run shuffles and tucks it to fine leg
Vettori to Johnson, no run withdraws the shot and the ball nearly lobs to forward short leg
Vettori to Johnson, no run gets forward and shoulders arms

Vettori to Johnson, OUT New Zealand are chipping away, Vettori bowls it flatter on the off stump, Johnson gets forward and offers a bat-pad catch to McIntosh at silly point who takes it inches off the turf, Aleem Dar sends him on his way immediately

Southee to North, OUT North is referring this, the ball lands on middle and goes through with the line, North plays all around it and is hit flush on the pad bang in front of middle, looked obvious to us and Asad Rauf, North challenges it but in the end it's a referral used up by Australia
Southee to Harris, FOUR runs Harris eases the nerves by clipping a half volley with ease wide of midwicket, nice way to out away a hat-trick ball
Southee to Harris, no run lands outside off and he leaves it alone
Southee to Harris, no run bangs it in short and Harris ducks and hangs the periscope out
Southee to Harris, 1 leg bye on the leg side and he clips him away down to fine leg
Southee to Hauritz, no run stays beside the line and punches him towards point
Vettori to Harris, no run quicker through the air and he gets a leading edge to the off side
Vettori to Harris, no run just stays behind the line and defends
Vettori to Harris, no run gets forward and defends to the on side
Vettori to Harris, no run pushes it just wide of forward short leg
Vettori to Harris, no run
Vettori to Harris, no run tossed up outside off and left alone to the keeper
Southee to Hauritz, no run lands it outside off and he allows it to go through to the keeper
Southee to Hauritz, no run bangs it in short and the batsman does well to bend and evade it
Southee to Hauritz, no run stays at the crease and steers it to the off side
Southee to Hauritz, no run probes outside off and he lets it go, the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
Southee to Hauritz, no run lands it outside off and he lets this one go as well
Southee to Hauritz, no run bowls from wide of the crease, same result, left alone
Vettori to Harris, 1 run stays back and punches it to mid-on who's deep
Vettori to Hauritz, no run defends to the off side
Vettori to Hauritz, no run fires it flatter and quicker, safely kept away
Vettori to Hauritz, no run slower through the air and defended to silly point
Vettori to Hauritz, no run defended on the front foot to silly point again
Vettori to Hauritz, 2 runs drifts on the pads and he clips it to the vacant spaces at midwicket
Southee to Harris, FOUR runs streaky boundary, he pitches it up and wings it away, Harris shapes to drive but gets a thick outside edge wide of second slip
Southee to Harris, no run stays behind the line and defends
Southee to Harris, no run lands it on a good length outside off and left alone
Southee to Harris, 1 run a little too full and he works it across the line down to fine leg
Southee to Hauritz, FOUR runs bowls it full and swings it away slightly, another outside edge off the drive and he perfectly bisects the gap between second slip and gully
Southee to Hauritz, no run stays beside the line and defends to the off side
Vettori to Harris, no run Vettori fires it in towards legstump, tapped towards midwicket

Vettori to Harris, OUT Vettori strikes, the Australian collapse continues, the arm ball does the job, Harris is hit on the front foot as he looks to whip it square, in front of middle and leg, Harris is gone
Vettori to Bollinger, no run fullish and just outside off, defended
Vettori to Bollinger, 2 runs punched through cover this time for a couple
Vettori to Bollinger, no run outside off and goes through to the keeper

Vettori to Bollinger, 2 runs not too much room but Bollinger cuts that firmly, Guptill has a long chase and has to dive near the rope to keep the ball in, third umpire is needed to determine whether that diving slide resulted in a clean stop
Arnel to Hauritz, no run length ball on off, blocked towards cover
Arnel to Hauritz, FOUR runs short of length ball outside off, lashed through cover off the front foot by Hauritz
Arnel to Hauritz, no run a touch fuller this time, watchfully defended off the front foot towards the off side
Arnel to Hauritz, no run tests him with the short ball, Hauritz isn't backing down, he goes for the pull but gets nowhere near the ball, which sails through to the keeper
Arnel to Hauritz, no run another short ball, over the batsman's head this time, no stroke offered

Arnel to Hauritz, 1 run short of length ball on off, played with soft hands towards cover, the batsmen pinch a tight single, Sinclair charged in towards the ball, a direct hit from him would have sent him back
Vettori to Hauritz, 1 run opens the face of the bat and dabs it just wide of short third man
Vettori to Bollinger, 4 byes wild swing and a miss and it costs NZ four byes because McCullum failed to get behind it, quicker delivery outside off

Vettori to Bollinger, OUT the bails are down and the innings is over, Vettori bowls this one quicker and flatter, the ball clips the pad and clips the stumps as Bollinger gets forward to defend, leaves a big gap between pad and bat

So Southee and Vettori combine to skittle out Australia for 231 after losing the toss. Australia will look back at the innings with a lot of regret because some of their main batters threw it away - Watson, Ponting, Clarke and to a lesser extent, Katich. Having said that, the bowlers were consistent and kept the pressure on and didn't let any
The Australia huddle is on. We will have about 13 overs today, the light should hold. 3 slips and a forward short leg in place
Bollinger to McIntosh, no run appeal for a lbw! Swings in and hits him low on the front pad, probably sliding down leg
Bollinger to McIntosh, no run 142 kmh, seemed quicker than that, the ball straightened and fizzed past the outside edge, top delivery
Bollinger to McIntosh, no run slower in pace and safely left alone this time, good carry
Bollinger to McIntosh, FOUR runs that's a low full toss and he puts it away, he tries to swing it inwards but fails to land it on the pitch, clipped wide of square leg
Bollinger to McIntosh, no run full in length outside off and defended to the off side

Bollinger to McIntosh, OUT McIntosh had no idea where his off stump was! Bollinger lands it on a fullish length just outside off and gets it to nip back in, McIntosh shoulders arms but looks back to see his off stump pegged back, Bollinger kisses the Australian crest and not the VB sponsor logo!
Harris to Watling, 1 run defended to mid-on for a quick single
Harris to Sinclair, FOUR runs well done Mathew! Harris gives him a half volley on the leg stump and Sinclair eases it past midwicket, the outfield does the rest
Harris to Sinclair, 1 run drifts on the pads again and he eases it wide of square leg this time, good start for Sinclair
Harris to Watling, no run lands it outside off and he safely lets it go
Harris to Watling, no run Watling's circumspect outside the off stump and he just manages to withdraw his bat in time
Harris to Watling, no run stays right behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run lands it a touch wide outside off and he safely lets it go to the keeper
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run brings it closer to the off stump and he's happy to let it go
Bollinger to Sinclair, (no ball) he oversteps, Sinclair gets right behind the line and defends softly
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run this one shoots up and has Sinclair swaying back to evade it, scary stuff from Bollinger
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run great stuff again from the bowler, this one cuts back in and fizzes past the off stump, well left
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run stays right behind the line and defends down the track
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run lands it a touch wide outside off but Sinclair's not chasing that
Harris to Watling, no run fullish in length on the off stump and defended
Harris to Watling, no run down the leg side and he works it away down the leg side, beaten for pace there
Harris to Watling, no run stays right behind the line and defends to the off side
Harris to Watling, no run stays right behind the line and defends
Harris to Watling, no run nice line and length and defended solidly
Harris to Watling, no run
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run lands it a touch wide outside off and he gets forward and shoulders arms
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run fuller in length and he gets behind the line to defend
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run keeps it on a same fullish length outside off and he safely lets it go
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run probes on the same line and length outside off, gets good nip and bounce off the wicket
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run action replay, if he bowls it there all day, Sinclair will leave it all day
Bollinger to Sinclair, no run copy-paste!
Harris to Watling, 2 runs swings it on the pads and he clips it wide of square leg
Harris to Watling, 1 run Harris meanwhile strays towards the pads again and easily tucked down to fine leg
Harris to Sinclair, no run lands it on the off stump this time and safely defended
Harris to Sinclair, no run holds the length back slightly but solidly defended
Harris to Sinclair, no run lands it outside off and he safely lets it go to the keeper
Harris to Sinclair, no run goes across the stumps and defends solidly on the backfoot
Bollinger to Watling, no run keeps it on a good length outside off and left alone
Bollinger to Watling, no run fires it on a yorker length on the off stump and squirted out to the off side
Bollinger to Watling, no run lands it a touch wide outside off and he's happy to let it go
Bollinger to Watling, no run comes round the wicket and bowls the bouncer, he safely ducks under it
Bollinger to Watling, no run bowls it fuller and Watling steers it down to gully and tells his partner to stay back
Bollinger to Watling, no run hits a good length outside off and he safely lets it go to the keeper

Harris to Sinclair, no run bangs it in short and the ball swings away viciously before reaching the keeper, Haddin goes to his left at first but then has to move the other way and does well to catch it one handed
Harris to Sinclair, no run lands it outside off and he leaves it alone
Harris to Sinclair, no run
Harris to Sinclair, no run shoulders arms again
Harris to Sinclair, no run flicks it off his pads but Katich does well at midwicket to cut it off
Harris to Sinclair, no run lands it on a good length outside off and he lets this go as well
Johnson to Watling, no run lands it a touch wide outside off, he's happy to let it go
Johnson to Watling, 1 run fires it on the pads and he tucks it down to Harris at fine leg
Johnson to Sinclair, no run lands it on a good length outside off and he lets it go
Johnson to Sinclair, no run holds the length back and the ball straightens before reaching the keeper
Johnson to Sinclair, no run a little fuller but the same result, good bounce and carry
Johnson to Sinclair, no run fires it outside off, Haddin's gloves take another pounding
Hauritz to Watling, no run gets forward and defends
Hauritz to Watling, no run stays back and punches it down the track
Hauritz to Watling, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, moves across his stumps and tucks it to fine leg
Hauritz to Sinclair, no run stays back and defends back to the bowler
Hauritz to Sinclair, no run
Hauritz to Sinclair, no run defends with soft hands
Johnson to Watling, no run lands it outside off and he lets it go to Haddin
Johnson to Watling, no run stays beside the line and defends to the off side
Johnson to Watling, no run full on the off stump and gets well forward to defend
Johnson to Watling, no run fires that full outside off and he safely lets that go
Johnson to Watling, no run I expected him to bowl it short so as to get the leg gully in action but instead he bowls it full and wide outside off
Johnson to Watling, no run full on the off stump and safely pushed back to the bowler
Hauritz to Sinclair, 2 runs Haury comes round the wicket, he tucks it to deep square leg
Hauritz to Sinclair, no run gets well forward and defends
Hauritz to Sinclair, no run comes well forward and smothers the spin
Hauritz to Sinclair, 1 run
Hauritz to Watling, no run comes well forward and blocks it out
Hauritz to Watling, no run fires it quicker and flatter, played out safely back to the bowler
Johnson to Sinclair, no run finally bowls something close to a wicket-taking delivery, very good bouncer and Sinclair sways backwards and loses his balance
Johnson to Sinclair, no run gets behind the line and defends to the off side
Johnson to Sinclair, no run he hops at the crease and the batsman gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
Johnson to Sinclair, no run that's a fizzer past the outside edge, I don't know how he didn't nick it, the ball just straightens after pitching
Johnson to Sinclair, no run similar delivery, keeps it outside off and safely left alone this time
Johnson to Sinclair, no run fizzes past the off stump and Sinclair survives to fight another day, very good last over but too late in the day
Harris to Watling, no run back of a length, angling in, defended to leg
Harris to Watling, no run shorter, and it rises towards his chest, Watling gets on the top of the bounce, and defends
Harris to Watling, no run slightly fuller, and straighter, Watling shapes to play it to leg, and is squared up
Harris to Watling, no run first wide delivery of the morning, and Watling lets it go through to Haddin
Harris to Watling, no run looks to come forward and defends a length delivery
Harris to Watling, 2 runs full offering on the pads, and is worked away for a couple - no movement for Harris in the first over, neither in air nor off the pitch

Johnson to Sinclair, 3 runs and runs back all the way to wide long-on boundary, there's no one in front of square on on side, and he balls this into the ribs, and Sinclair just bunts it down the ground, helping himself to three runs
Johnson to Watling, no run short, into the ribs again, Watling gets out of its way
Johnson to Watling, no run fuller, still on the pads, played to short mid-on
Johnson to Watling, no run full and way outside off, Watling shoulders arms
Johnson to Watling, no run and full and wide again, and left alone again
Johnson to Watling, no run short ball, over the stumps, Watling has enough time to duck under it

Harris to Sinclair, no run what a ripper, just back of driving length, just outside off, making him stretch - he couldn't have left it alone either - and upon pitching it bounces and leaves him, missing the edge
Harris to Sinclair, no run short, fast, tucking him up, defended
Harris to Sinclair, no run leg-side half volley, and he gets an inside edge onto the pad
Harris to Sinclair, no run shorter one, sways out of its line
Harris to Sinclair, no run fuller, but wide enough for Sinclair to be not interested in it
Harris to Sinclair, no run another inside edge onto the pad, this wasn't quite a half-volley, though
Johnson to Watling, no run angled across him, comes forward and defends
Johnson to Watling, no run drives at a full and wide one, gets a sort of toe end, hits it one bounce to point
Johnson to Watling, no run short and wide, left alone
Johnson to Watling, 1 run short, into the ribs, turned to square leg
Johnson to Sinclair, no run full and wide, this time he shoulders arms
Johnson to Sinclair, no run full delivery, no swing there, and defended without trouble
Harris to Watling, 2 runs full delivery, angling into the pads, helped along its way
Harris to Watling, (no ball) length delivery outside off, left alone. Asad Rauf calls him for over-stepping
Harris to Watling, no run back of a length, outside off, shapes away a touch, left alone
Harris to Watling, no run full delivery, defended with a full face, one bounce to silly mid-on
Harris to Watling, no run punched away to point from outside off
Harris to Watling, no run dug in short, follows Watling as he tries to get out of the way, can't catch up with him
Harris to Watling, 1 run nicely pushed away into the gap between point and cover and takes a quick single
Johnson to Watling, no run nice, sharp bumper, 148ks, over the stumps, Watling ducks well
Johnson to Watling, no run fuller and wider, Watling covers the off stump before shouldering arms
Johnson to Watling, 1 run full on the pads, worked away wide of mid-on for a single
Johnson to Sinclair, no run well bowled, not too short - certainly not in Johnson's half, and it kicks up at him, nipping in too, Sinclair somehow manages to keep it down
Johnson to Taylor, no run angled across Ross, he lets it go
Harris to Watling, no run short, angled in to him, defended towards short midwicket
Harris to Watling, no run back of a length, outside off, punched away to point
Harris to Watling, no run fuller, outside off, left alone
Harris to Watling, no run defended off the back foot
Harris to Watling, FOUR runs shot! stands tall, and punches this one through point region, punches that square are not seen that often - first boundary of the morning, and it's been a half hour
Harris to Watling, no run back of a length, defended away from his body
Johnson to Taylor, no run bouncer, straight, over the stumps, Taylor ducks under it
Johnson to Taylor, no run this bouncer is down the leg side, easier to duck under
Johnson to Taylor, 2 runs short, doesn't rise up enough this time, and worked away towards midwicket, and once again Johnson has to go cut the boundary

Johnson to Taylor, 3 runs slower ball, Taylor ends up pushing at this way in front of his body, but he has timed it superbly, and despite Clarke's taking pace off it, diving from point, it almost reaches the cover boundary

Johnson to Watling, 2 runs nearly another one for Mitch, this it hasn't quite swung in, and is not quite the perfect yorker length, Watling's bat gets down in time and he takes two in the vacant leg side
Johnson to Watling, no run Johnson is interested in bowling full to Watling, and he defends it slightly across the line, which might just be the reason why he is trying that full one
Harris to Taylor, 2 runs full, on and around off, and whipped away through square leg
Harris to Taylor, no run slightly shorter and wider, Taylor gets across and punches it down to mid-on
Harris to Taylor, no run slower ball, 126ks, Taylor is jabbing at it again, gets an edge that falls short of slip
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length, angled in, defended to midwicket

Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs Watson and Ponting leave it for each other! Definitely a chance! a ripper of a delivery, pitching middle and off, and then shaping away, and flying perfectly between the two slips. Ponting at second and Watson at first look at each other. Perhaps it was Watson's catch as he was the deeper man
Harris to Taylor, no run fuller, outside off, defended straight
Johnson to Watling, no run angled across him, blocked
Johnson to Watling, no run half-volley outside off, drives at it but the bat face turns in the hand, ends up hitting straighter than intended
Johnson to Watling, no run pulls the length back, can't do much with it, there isn't much room either
Johnson to Watling, 1 run straying onto the pads, flicked away
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs lovely shot, half-volley outside off, and he has off-driven it, straight of mid-off, what a nice sight, the text-book drive
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs Taylor is thankfully full of intent, and he has crashes this half-volley through covers, with an open face this time, but not looking to hit it too hard
Watson to Watling, no run starts with a shortish delivery outside off, pushed back to him
Watson to Watling, no run fuller, wider, left alone, no problem
Watson to Watling, no run defends a length ball back to Watto
Watson to Watling, FOUR runs short and wide, goes after it, gets a thick edge that flies over gully
Watson to Watling, no run presses forward to a length delivery and defends again

Watson to Watling, FOUR runs more positivity from Watling, half-volley outside off, stands tall and drives it nicely through the gap between mid-off and extra cover. Suddenly NZ have got a move on here
Bollinger to Taylor, no run full, on the pads, defended to mid-on
Bollinger to Taylor, 5 runs four overthrows! Ross tips and runs, Clarke fancies himself running in from point, but the throw is wide and mid-on has no chanace
Bollinger to Watling, no run short ball outside off, left alone
Bollinger to Watling, 1 run straying into the pads, worked around the corner
Bollinger to Taylor, no run back of a length, into the hips, defended
Bollinger to Taylor, 2 runs nice shot, driven on the up, leans into this delivery angling across him, it's a push-drive really, through covers
Watson to Watling, no run fullish delivery wide of off, easy to not mess with that one
Watson to Watling, no run slight shape in, but it started too wide of off to bother him
Watson to Watling, no run full and wide, and left alone
Watson to Watling, no run back of a length, outside off, pushed to cover
Watson to Watling, no run short ball, not much pace, and he ducks under it
Watson to Watling, no run nips back in, but it starts too wide and moves in too little to bother his defensive stroke
Bollinger to Taylor, no run short, angling away, left alone
Bollinger to Taylor, no run full ball, on the stumps, hurries him a touch, defended to leg
Bollinger to Taylor, FOUR runs streaky boundary, throws his bat at a wide delivery, gets a thick edge that flies between third slip and gully
Bollinger to Taylor, 2 runs angling across, punched away through point, nice looking shot
Bollinger to Taylor, no run a good shot followed by a loose one, looks to cut this one with all his might, but the ball is too full and despite his quick hands he is beaten
Bollinger to Taylor, (no ball) short, angling across, Aleem Dar calls him for over-stepping - a tight call, his heel landed on the line and then lifted
Bollinger to Taylor, FOUR runs Rosco is teasing them, punches square again, uppish, but between backward point and cover point, 50 runs for the partnership already
Watson to Watling, FOUR runs beautiful shot, Taylor's enthusiasm is rubbing off to Watling, nicely punched away, on the up, standing tall, through covers
Watson to Watling, no run pulls the length back, defended straight this time
Watson to Watling, no run slight shape away, maybe just holding its line, gets right behind it to defend it back to Watto
Watson to Watling, no run punched away nicely again, finds short cover
Watson to Watling, no run slightly straighter, played to leg, to short midwicket
Watson to Watling, 3 runs straying on the pads, too full, and helped away easily even though he has got too far across and a bit inside the line
Bollinger to Watling, FOUR runs thick edge, but soft hands mean it stays down, and to hurt Aussies more, it finds the gap between third slip and gully
Bollinger to Watling, no run mix-up, mix-up, all thanks to a lovely dive from Clarke at cover-point, and Taylor has to go back from half way down and just about makes it
Bollinger to Watling, 2 runs good-looking shot, not quite a cracker, but driven wide of cover and he picks up an other couple
Bollinger to Watling, no run nice short one, on the stumps, and rising, and it takes some doing to get put of its way
Bollinger to Watling, no run another beauty, shapes to swing in, Watling is playing for the swing, but leaves him upon pitching, beating him
Bollinger to Watling, no run shortish, outside off, defended back to the bowler
Watson to Taylor, no run almost pulled on the stumps, short all right but stays low a fraction, gets a bottom edge onto his pads
Watson to Taylor, no run a ripper of a legcutter, beauty, there was no way he could have left it alone. It angled in, pitched around off, and then left him. real lucky to not have nicked it
Watson to Taylor, no run squared up while defending it, an exaggerated back-and-across movement really
Watson to Taylor, no run full, moves across, must have interested Watson with a possible lbw but flicks it nicely, short midwicket deflects it to mid-on

Watson to Taylor, FOUR runs another streaky boundary, nothing going to hand here, he looks to punch this one down the ground, gets a thick edge that goes at a catchable height wide of slips and down to third man
Watson to Taylor, no run gets behind the line of this one and defends
Bollinger to Watling, no run angled across the body, and he defends it off the back foot
Bollinger to Watling, no run gets into a mini-tangle as the front foot moves too far across as he defends around the front pad
Bollinger to Watling, 2 runs nice off-drive, it's a wide half-volley, but goes to the right of mid-off as opposed to left, that bat turned in his hands actually, gets a couple
Bollinger to Watling, no run driven on the up, two bounces to mid-off
Bollinger to Watling, 1 run gets a bit big on him, gets on top of it, and pushes it between the two points, a hesitant single ensues, and had Hussey hit Taylor was a goner
Bollinger to Taylor, no run not quite forward in this forward-defensive, gets the inside half of the bat, towards mid-on
Watson to Watling, no run short and wide, left alone, Haddin earns his match fee
Watson to Watling, no run fuller, straighter, defended back to Watson
Watson to Watling, 1 run pulled away, gets a sort of bottom edge but it is safe
Watson to Taylor, FOUR runs Taylor shows how it is done, drags this from outside off, and thumps it wide of midwicket
Watson to Taylor, no run presses forward and defends a length ball

Watson to Taylor, SIX runs shot! Taylor special! Roscoe is putting up a show here! This is slightly back of a length, mind you, and he pulls it off the front foot, not bothering to keep it down, and brings up his fifty! What quick hands
Bollinger to Guptill, no run starts off leaving alone a short delivery angling across him
Bollinger to Guptill, no run short ball, closer to the stumps, ducks under it
Bollinger to Guptill, no run wide again, and shoulders arms to this one
Bollinger to Guptill, no run full and wide, and again he lets Haddin do the honours
Bollinger to Guptill, no run back of a length, closer to stumps, making him play, he gets behind the line and defends
Hauritz to Taylor, no run flighted outside off, Taylor goes all the way across to defend
Hauritz to Taylor, 2 runs flighted wide again, too full, and he drives it against whatever turn there is, and comes back for two

Hauritz to Taylor, FOUR runs poor bit of cricket from Taylor and Johnson! Taylor has waited just two deliveries before looking for the slog-sweep, and he has dragged it straight down the throat of Johnson at mid-on, whose hands have suddenly become porous and lets it through
Hauritz to Taylor, no run flighted down the leg side
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run worked around the corner for one
Hauritz to Guptill, no run closer to stumps this time, and defended back to the bowler
Bollinger to Taylor, no run tucks him up with a short one into the ribs, he stands tall and defends

Bollinger to Taylor, FOUR runs Taylor is being a great tease, follows an awful piece of cricket in the last over with a sensational cover-drive, gets right on top of this length delivery and pierces a tight off-side ring, top shot

Bollinger to Taylor, FOUR runs and he frustrates Ponting some more, slightly wider than the previous delivery and he throws his arms at it, and it takes the outside half of the bat and flies over point
Bollinger to Taylor, FOUR runs and a superb shot again! short, not too wide, but he leans back slightly to make room, and doesn't bother about keeping the cut shot down, three fours in a row now
Bollinger to Taylor, no run goes for a yorker, it ends up a low full toss, hit to mid-on
Bollinger to Taylor, no run looks to cut one that it close to his body, doesn't get it past point
Hauritz to Guptill, no run floater outside off, defends but it doesn't quite turn, gets the outside half of the bat
Hauritz to Guptill, no run this time it turns as expected and he pats it into the leg side
Hauritz to Guptill, no run tossed up around off, pushed back to the bowler
Hauritz to Guptill, no run stays back to a fullish ball, and defends it
Hauritz to Guptill, no run shouts of catch it for a bat-pad but it hasn't gone far enough for forward short leg to be interested
Hauritz to Guptill, 2 runs good ball, hint of drift, and then sharp turn and bounce in to him, Guptill gets his bottom hand off it and manages to place it fine
Harris to Taylor, no run pitched up outside off, pushed to cover
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length, outside off, shoulders arms
Harris to Taylor, no run fuller, driven this time, middles it, but hits it straight to cover
Harris to Taylor, 1 wide called wide for height, the bouncer goes over head-high as he ducks under it
Harris to Taylor, no run fuller, but still not driving length, Taylor goes back to defend
Harris to Taylor, no run length ball outside off, Taylor defends

Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs another top shot from Roscoe, beautiful on-drive, slightly fuller than good length, and slightly too straight and he pushes it down the ground, lovely timing, he just met it
Hauritz to Guptill, no run drift there, but too full to turn back and Guptill leaves it alone
Hauritz to Guptill, 2 runs beautifully bowled for no reward, tossed up again, and this goes straight on, Guptill plays for the break and gets an edge, wide of slip
Hauritz to Guptill, no run too wide and too full for him to play at it
Hauritz to Guptill, no run more drift, making him get across outside off to defend
Hauritz to Guptill, no run slightly shorter, Guptill stays back and pushes it back to Ritzer
Hauritz to Guptill, no run quicker, fuller, nearly yorks him
Harris to Taylor, 1 run short delivery, worked wide of mid-on for one
Harris to Guptill, no run full, on the stumps, pushed to midwicket
Harris to Guptill, no run full, on off stump, hit back to Harris
Harris to Vettori, no run ordinary shot first ball, not too wide as he looks to cut it, and plays outside the line of it
Harris to Vettori, no run is that nerves? pushes at one angling across him, and he gets the inside half of the bat, towards mid-on
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run turn into the pads, worked away for one
Hauritz to Vettori, no run presses forward to defend one outside off
Hauritz to Vettori, FOUR runs slightly short and he has tucked into it, way to get off the duck in 100th Test, pulled away with minimal of fuss

Hauritz to Vettori, FOUR runs Vettori special sweep, tossed up wide outside off, he kneels across, gets the bat down from a high position, and sweeps over it, keeping it down, and managing to beat deep square leg
Hauritz to Vettori, FOUR runs and Danny goes behind square on the off side, lovely batting, slightly flat, he waits for it, and late-cuts it past short third
Hauritz to Vettori, no run flighted outside off, and defended back to him
Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs top shot, full outside off, and he leans into it to drive it past cover, lovely timing, nice lunch he must have had
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length now, stays back and pushes it back to Harris
Harris to Taylor, no run another crunchy off-drive, on the up, but can't beat Johnson at mid-off
Harris to Taylor, 1 run appeal for leg-before, but it is angling down the leg side, and the umpire doesn't even signal a leg-bye
Harris to Vettori, no run short, angling across him, defends to cover
Harris to Vettori, 2 runs worked away into the on side from outside off, wristy shot, and away enough for square leg for him to come back for two
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run in-between length but Taylor goes back and punches it against the turn, through point
Hauritz to Vettori, no run runs it down to short third and sends Taylor back, good call
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run full on off, a risky sweep shot but gets the bat down in time
Hauritz to Taylor, no run slight drift, flighted outside off, Taylor is close to it when he defends it
Hauritz to Taylor, no run straighter, looks to push it to leg for one, but hasn't got it wide enough of Hauritz
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run goes deep into the crease and turns one around the corner for one
Harris to Taylor, 1 run tips and runs, wide of mid-on
Harris to McCullum, no run gets a sharp short delivery, 141ks, not well directed, though, down the leg side and it's easy to leave alone
Harris to McCullum, no run McCullum presses forward to defend a length ball outside off
Harris to McCullum, no run short outside off, goes back and across to push it to cover
Harris to McCullum, no run nicely bowled, just outside off, just short of driving length, McCullum gets behind it to defend
Hauritz to Taylor, FOUR runs short and wide and cut away fine of deep point, Taylor continues to stay positive
Hauritz to Taylor, no run tossed up this time, gets behind it and defends it back to Hauritz
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run worked away from outside off for a single to deep square leg
Hauritz to McCullum, no run well bowled, flighted just outside off, gets sharp turn in, McCullum sort of moves too far across in defending
Hauritz to McCullum, no run this time he covers the line better as he pats it back to Hauritz
Hauritz to McCullum, no run thrown up outside off, McCullum stretches forward to push it to cover
Harris to Taylor, no run hint of holding its line, Taylor is sort of squared up as he defends
Harris to Taylor, no run nice on-drive, length ball and he doesn't have to move forward to hit this one, but the mid-on is straight enough
Harris to Taylor, no run back of a length, plays this one with soft hands, towards silly mid-on
Harris to Taylor, no run slower ball, 132ks, cutting into him, Taylor stays on the crease and defends
Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs and he has created width here by leaning back slightly and through his quick hands. It was short enough, and he made room and cut it wide of gully, in the air

Harris to Taylor, no run dropped again, by Watson, would you believe it? third life to Taylor, he drives at a full delivery outside off, gets a regulation edge and Watson drops one to his left, perfectly catchable height and not too far him either. Went with hard hands, I suppose as it went in and out, sort of grabbed at it
Hauritz to McCullum, no run turning into pads, defended to on
Hauritz to McCullum, no run gets a stride in and pats it back to the bowler
Hauritz to McCullum, 1 run worked around the corner for one
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run turning into the pads, helped along its way
Hauritz to McCullum, no run overpitched outside off, nearly yorks him
Hauritz to McCullum, no run plays with the spin, one bounce to forward short leg
Harris to Taylor, 2 runs nice shot, there isn't much width here, but he punches a back-of-a-length delivery wide of deep point, and comes back for two
Harris to Taylor, no run length ball outside off, defended
Harris to Taylor, no run cover-drive, nice-looking shot, can't find the gap
Harris to Taylor, no run well-directed bouncer, 140ks, into the body, doesn't rise too high either, Taylor somehow gets under it
Harris to Taylor, FOUR runs And Roscoe rubs it in some more, he has not let anything affect his positive strokeplay today, this is short and wide, and smashed to point boundary
Harris to Taylor, no run wide delivery again, and he smashes this one too, with an open face, one bounce to gully
Hauritz to McCullum, no run thrown up wide, McCullum doesn't have anything to with it
Hauritz to McCullum, no run again flighted wide outside off and left alone
Hauritz to McCullum, no run slightly closer to stumps, McCullum comes forward to smother the spin
Hauritz to McCullum, no run stays on the crease to defend this one
Hauritz to McCullum, no run moves across the stumps but doesn't get inside the line enough to turn it around the corner
Hauritz to McCullum, no run defends off the front foot
Johnson to Taylor, no run short and sharp, 144ks, defended outside off
Johnson to Taylor, no run pitched up, angling across him, pushed to cover-point

Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs that's the fastest Test century by a New Zealander! short and wide, and cuts it, not bothering about keeping it down, and it nearly flies all the way for six to third man boundary, from where the NZ women's hockey team is watching. Takes off his helmet, arms aloft, but he knows his job is not over
Johnson to Taylor, no run back of a length, defended to short cover
Johnson to Taylor, no run fuller delivery, driven to mid-off
Johnson to Taylor, no run goes for another cut, but this is too close even by Taylor's standards, and he ends up playing it one bounce to gully
Hauritz to McCullum, no run Hauritz continues to get some drift, McCullum gets close to it, though, and defends
Hauritz to McCullum, FOUR runs too full, too straight, McCullum moves across and sweeps it very fine, his first boundary
Hauritz to McCullum, no run moves back and across to defend one that is not too short
Hauritz to McCullum, no run presses forward and defends
Hauritz to McCullum, no run slightly shorter and he stays back this time
Hauritz to McCullum, no run goes back and across, looking to turn it to leg, but Hauritz is too wide of off
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run wide of off, pushed away to deep point
Johnson to McCullum, no run good bumper, 148ks, over the stumps, McCullum has to be quick to get under this as this one doesn't rise too high
Johnson to Patel, no run quick bouncer that doesn't rise much, 151ks, and Jeetan does well to get under it, it has gone only rib high after pitching in Johnson's half
Johnson to Patel, no run outside leg, Patel is beaten for pace, the ball thuds into the pads
Johnson to Patel, no run angled across, and his feet don't move a centimetre as he wafts at it and misses
Hauritz to Taylor, no run cuts a fullish delivery, North makes a nice diving save at backward point
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run into the pads, and flicked away for one
Hauritz to Patel, no run looks to work this from in front of the stumps, gets an inside edge onto the pad, but somehow it doesn't make it as far as forward short leg
Hauritz to Patel, no run wide outside off, leaves it alone
Hauritz to Patel, no run comes forward to defend
Hauritz to Patel, no run some drift again, Patel is fending at it away from his body, but plays it with the middle of his bat
Johnson to Taylor, no run crisp cover-drive, straight to extra cover
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run slower ball, 135ks as opposed to the previous one bat 145ks, Taylor is early into it, ends up chipping it short of sweeper-cover
Johnson to Patel, no run full and fast and straight, defended towards mid-off
Johnson to Patel, no run back of a length, gets behind the line and defends
Johnson to Patel, no run short, doesn't get into the chest or ribs, where he wants to be, defended easily
Johnson to Patel, no run fuller, and pushed back to the bowler
Hauritz to Taylor, no run short of a length, pushed back to the bowler
Hauritz to Taylor, (no ball) FOUR runs half-volley wide outside off, and Taylor smacks it over mid-off, clean, one bounce into the fence, and he has over-stepped too

Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run Watson is brilliant at deep midwicket, and gets a generous applause too... slog-swept, Watson takes the catch at the edge of the boundary, to his right, and it is very difficult to keep his balance as both feet are in the air when he catches it, but before falling over he throws the ball back in play
Hauritz to Patel, 1 run worked around the corner for one
Hauritz to Taylor, SIX runs what a strike, slog-swept from way outside off, and Watson has no chance of catching this, they have lost the ball behind midwicket, big six
Hauritz to Taylor, SIX runs Taylor is on fire here, and this ground is too small, Hauritz - brave man - flights it again, and gets it in Taylor's arc, and watches it sail over long-on
Hauritz to Taylor, SIX runs bye bye ball, this was a one-day wide outside off had he not played it, and he had slog-swept it over cow corner, gluttony from Taylor
Johnson to Patel, no run short outside off, pushed to gully
Johnson to Patel, no run bouncer outside off, easy to duck under it
Johnson to Patel, no run short, into the thigh pad, beats him for pace
Johnson to Patel, no run pitched up outside off, pushed to cover
Johnson to Patel, 2 runs angling in, Patel meets it with an open face, and finds a gap in covers, a sluggish Bollinger allows them come back for two
Johnson to Patel, no run presses forward and defends outside off
Bollinger to Taylor, 1 run Taylor still takes the single, to sweeper-cover
Bollinger to Patel, no run angled across him and he is beaten as he plays away from the body
Bollinger to Patel, no run gets behind this one and drives nicely to mid-off
Bollinger to Patel, no run back of a length, close to off, defended off the front foot
Bollinger to Patel, FOUR runs Patel gets into action here, short and wide all right, but he gets on top of the bounce and caresses it past gully
Bollinger to Patel, no run full delivery, driven to the widish mid-off in place
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs exploits the strong off-side field and the round-the-wicket angle as he clips this one from outside off the fine-leg boundary
Johnson to Taylor, no run full ball outside off, defended
Johnson to Taylor, 2 runs low full toss, he has hit it hard, and more importantly placed it between deep point and sweeper cover, North makes a diving save
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run short, outside off, and places it wide of point
Johnson to Patel, no run full and across him, and hit powerfully to point, Patel getting confident here
Bollinger to Taylor, no run angled across him, and Taylor leaves it be
Bollinger to Taylor, no run angled across him again, and he shoulders arms again
Bollinger to Taylor, 1 run length ball on the pads, takes a single to long-on, three balls to play for Southee, the new batsman in
Bollinger to Southee, no run wide outside off, and left alone
Bollinger to Southee, 1 run pitched up on the pads, Southee plays the shot too early, and the leading edge falls wide of the widish mid-off

Bollinger to Taylor, OUT review, Taylor goes for the boundary with the field up, goes for the pull shot, the ball is too full, Aussies appeal for a bottom edge, Asad Rauf doesn't move. Hot spot shows a faint tickle as the ball passes the bat, and Rauf overturns his decision

Johnson to Southee, FOUR runs whipped away off the pads, and more clumsy fielding from Bollinger at fine leg, he comes around, bends slowly, pulls it in, and then kicks it over - he didn't intend to do so, mind you
Johnson to Southee, no run Southee is going for it, pulls and misses
Johnson to Southee, 1 run and Southee takes the single, bunting it to cover
Johnson to Arnel, no run drives at this one, toe end, to cover-point
Johnson to Arnel, no run angled across him, he hangs the bat out, it misses the edge somehow
Johnson to Arnel, no run length ball on the stumps, looks to defend, gets the outside of the bat, to gully
Bollinger to Southee, 1 run full toss on pads, hit down to long-on, and he takes the single
Bollinger to Arnel, no run full outside off, hit to cover
Bollinger to Arnel, no run leaves this one alone outside off
Bollinger to Arnel, no run short, fends it away to gully, manages to keep it down
Bollinger to Arnel, no run short, hip-high, manages to keep it down
Bollinger to Arnel, no run length ball, just outside off, plays it with soft hands, to cover
Johnson to Southee, 1 run full outside off, and Southee again takes the easy single
Johnson to Arnel, 1 run on the pads, and he tucks it away to fine leg
Johnson to Southee, 2 runs and Southee looks to clear them, that takes some thinking, short ball and he toe-ends the pull, which lands short of all leg-side fielders
Johnson to Southee, no run angled across him, and he is beaten as he looks to push it to cover
Johnson to Southee, FOUR runs long-on has come to a three-fourths position after that earlier miss, and Southee has driven this length ball powerfully enough to beat him
Johnson to Southee, no run and Johnson keeps his at that end with a sharp bouncer, aimed at his chest, he fends but can't take a single
Bollinger to Arnel, no run short, angling across him, manages to keep it down
Bollinger to Arnel, no run fuller, angling across him, and left alone
Bollinger to Arnel, no run short outside off, angling in, Arnell gets behind it and keeps it down
Bollinger to Arnel, no run full, and he drives this one, straight to cover
Bollinger to Arnel, no run this is a better short delivery, aimed at ribs, but at 137ks, not that quick, he gets behind it well
Bollinger to Arnel, FOUR runs flayed through covers, full and wide and he lets it rip and finds the gap this time, clean strike
Johnson to Southee, SIX runs whoa, Southee proving those defensive fields right! 15 rows back over long leg, clears the front leg, Johnson sends in a bouncer and he swings and connects
Johnson to Southee, no run slower ball, 133ks, is beaten outside off, the edge wouldn't have carried if he had managed one here
Johnson to Southee, 1 run short outside off, and he bunts into covers and runs
Johnson to Arnel, 2 runs this is an even better shot from Arnell than the boundary in the last over, gets the front close to the line, and push-drives through covers
Johnson to Arnel, no run this is better from Johnson, short and into the ribs, hits him in the glove but that hand is off the bat, and it doesn't carry anyway
Harris to Southee, 1 run Southee gets an inside edge onto pad and he is looking for two but Harris is quick to run towards midwicket and keep them down to one
Harris to Martin, no run angling into pads, fails to get bat on ball

3.30pm Australia will be elated with what has happened today, and New Zealand will be kicking themselves. Despite three dropped catches, and a Ross Taylor blinder - the fastest century by a New Zealander - they lead Australia's 231 by just 33 runs. They have taken early tea, join us in 20 minutes
Innings Start
Michael Clarke is going to be used with his left-arm orthodox spin just before tea
